description: Combining mandarin, marmalade and almonds, these easy overnight oats can be prepared ahead of time and make for a zesty breakfast.
name: Bitter Marmalade & Mandarin Overnight Oats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon 1 1/2 cups oat mixture into a bowl. To serve warm, microwave oat mixture, stirring halfway, on high for 1 minute 15 seconds or until warmed through. Spoon over bitter marmalade and mandarin topping and serve sprinkled with almonds.
